text: Alessandro Mazzinghi (3 October 1938 – 22 August 2020), known as Sandro, was an Italian professional boxer. He held the world light middleweight championship twice. He was born in Pontedera, Italy. Mazzinghi died on 22 August 2020 from a stroke in Pontedera, aged 81.Boxe, è morto Sandro Mazzinghi: fu campione del mondo superwelter degli anni '60 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian boxers Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Alessandro Mazzinghi
